*Thursday, October 8, 2020*

# Overview

Today, we begin trade policies by looking at the ubitquitous form of trade policy: tariffs (taxes) on imports. We might not finish today, and wrap up a few more things about tariffs next class, where we examine other types of trade barriers like quotas and subsidies.
